title: Why is warrior enchant even a thing?
body: Its AD and a tiny bit of CDR.... why not just slap tiamat in there instead and make a sub-par hydra item like every other enchant does for other items? Give it some gimmicky effect that is useful for clearing or something... straight AD and a little CDR is good for few champs and realistically those who build it could probably use a tiamat variant more effectively anyway... I am not saying its an amazing idea... but AD and a little cdr seems so lame for the time and resources you invest into it....
